TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DSAKeyValue extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoClause

summary.span: Representa la clave privada del elemento .

span.span: Represents the private key of the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El clase representa el `` elemento, que contiene un clave pública.The class represents the `` element, which contains a public key. Use para identificar la clave pública que corresponde a la clave privada que se usó para crear la firma digital.Use to identify the public key that corresponds to the private key that was used to create the digital signature. Si una clave no se proporciona explícitamente al constructor, un nuevo par de claves se genera aleatoriamente.If a key is not explicitly supplied to the constructor, a new key pair is randomly generated. La clase se utiliza con las firmas XML.The class is used with XML signatures. Para obtener más información acerca de la especificación de W3C, vea http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.For more information about the W3C specification, see http://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo usar el clase en cifrado XML para crear una firma desasociada.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create a detached signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CPP/exampledetached.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/CS/exampledetached.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Detached/VB/exampledetached.vb#1)] En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo usar el clase en cifrado XML para crear una firma con doble cifrado.The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in XML encryption to create an envelope signature. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CPP/exampleenvelope.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/CS/exampleenvelope.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML.DSAKeyValue_Envelope/VB/exampleenvelope.vb#1)]
